---

## SDQ vs GHQ-28

SDQ vs GHQ-28 When it comes to conducting psychological assessments, researchers often have to compare different instruments, such as the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and the General Health Questionnaire (28-item) (GHQ-28). If you're a psychologist interested in these two popular questionnaires and need to conduct an SDQ vs GHQ-28 comparison, then the Harmony software is precisely what you need! Harmony is a groundbreaking tool that uses natural language processing and AI models to simplify the harmonisation process. It offers an efficient, intuitive way to compare instruments like the SDQ and GHQ-28. Whether you're looking at the variation between two questionnaires or trying to find patterns across multiple studies, Harmony's large language models can provide a percentage match between different items. This powerful functionality makes tackling an SDQ vs GHQ-28 comparison simpler and less time-consuming. Moreover, if you're running a multinational study, Harmony can compare questionnaire items in multiple languages, allowing for better comparison and analysis. It pulls from a substantial database but also allows you to upload your questionnaire in PDF form. For your SDQ vs GHQ-28 comparison, choose the ease and accuracy of Harmony system. Visit https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app, upload the SDQ and GHQ-28, and run your analysis seamlessly and accurately.
